animeTitle: Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Sendai Kokeshi Enka
animeDescription: Shoko and Maiko Ougi are apparently two ordinary schoolgirls in pursuit of graduating and having fun. Shii-chan is the more serious while Mai-chan is more fun-loving. In reality, the two sisters are powerful exorcists from the Karura temple. Each wields half the power... Shii-chan can "see" the spirits, and Mai-chan can banish them. This is a spooky series with heavy emphasis on traditionally Japanese occult themes. (Source: AnimeNfo)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau!', 'Alternative version: Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Nara Onryou Emaki']
